title: My Journey into Dolby vs DTS: From DVDs to Dolby Atmos

title: My Journey into Mac RAM: From Swappable Sticks to Compressed Memory
excerpt: A personal story of how I started with a 2012 MacBook Pro and upgraded its RAM, and how today I use a MacBook Air M4 with 32 GB unified memory — learning how macOS manages RAM with compression, swap, and wired memory.
